function.name: run_command
function.arguments: {"command": "node -e \"const {ethers} = require('ethers'); const p = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.BASE_RPC || 'https://mainnet.base.org'); const w = new ethers.Wallet(process.env.DAIMON_WALLET_KEY, p); Promise.all([p.getBalance(w.address), p.getCode('0x833589fCD6eDb6E08f4c7C32D4f71b54bdA02913').then(() => 'USDC exists'), p.getCode('0x4200000000000000000000000000000000000006').then(() => 'WETH exists')]).then(async ([bal]) => { const usdc = new ethers.Contract('0x833589fCD6eDb6E08f4c7C32D4f71b54bdA02913', ['function balanceOf(address) view returns (uint256)'], p); const weth = new ethers.Contract('0x4200000000000000000000000000000000000006', ['function balanceOf(address) view returns (uint256)'], p); const usdcBal = await usdc.balanceOf(w.address); const wethBal = await weth.balanceOf(w.address); console.log('ETH:', ethers.formatEther(bal)); console.log('USDC:', ethers.formatUnits(usdcBal, 6)); console.log('WETH:', ethers.formatEther(wethBal)); })\""}
